import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react' import './WriteNewBlog.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { MdOutlineArrowBackIos } from 'react-icons/md' const WriteNewBlog = (props) => { const [newValue, setNewValue] = useState({}) const heading = useRef(); const author = useRef(); const blogpara = useRef(); const createSubmitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setNewValue({ head: heading.current.value, author: author.current.value, blog: blogpara.current.value }) } useEffect(()=>{ console.log(newValue) }, [newValue]) return (
